CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ), '', TEXT(DAY( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c )) + '-'+ CASE( MONTH( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c ) , 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", 12, "Dec", "None") + '-' + RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR( clofor_com_cfs__ETD__c )), 2) )
CustomField.label: Formatted ETD
